title: Prove you're not OFAC sanctioned without showing your name on-chain
text: We scan your ID to create a proof on-chain that you are not sanctioned (a soulbound token). This allows you to access DAOs etc.
verifyTitle: Verify yourself by clicking the button !
verifyText: We will now guide you to our partner Onfido for a safe KYC check that will confirm your age (over 18 y.o.) and OFAC status
